actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 99-1011.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for taking the concurrent resolution (H.Con.Res. 395) to correct technical errors in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 3838, from the Speaker's table with the Senate amendments and disposing of the Senate amendments.

summary.text: (Measure passed House, amended) Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H. Con. Res. 395 (correcting technical errors in the enrollment of H.R. 3838, the Tax Reform Act of 1986) with the Senate amendments thereto and disposing of such amendments.

titles.title: A resolution providing for taking the concurrent resolution (H.Con.Res. 395) to correct technical errors in the enrollment of the bill H.R. 3838, from the Speaker's table with the Senate amendments and disposing of the Senate amendments.
